name: DotX
description: DotX is a 'mouse only' game, where you will challenge your ability to control the mouse, as well as verify your emotional resistance. Pick up the dots and avoid bumping into the walls, as long as your health bar doesn't reach zero.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
